channel.title: CVE Feed for CyberChimps -- Responsive Mobile
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CyberChimps -- Responsive Mobile

item.title: CVE-2024-37949|2024-07-22T13:35:06.136Z -- cyberchimps -- responsive%20mobile
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in CyberChimps Responsive Mobile allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Responsive Mobile: from n/a through 1.15.1.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in CyberChimps Responsive Mobile allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Responsive Mobile: from n/a through 1.15.1.
